title: An alleged Italian mafia fugitive has been on the run for more than six years — until police recognized his tattoos on a YouTube cooking show
content:
1. An alleged Italian mafia fugitive has been on the run for more than six years — until police recognized his tattoos on a YouTube cooking show  CBS News
  2. Mafia fugitive was living a quiet island life. Then police found his YouTube cooking show.  Yahoo News
  3. Italian Fugitive Arrested In Caribbean Thanks To Cooking Videos  NPR
  4. Suspected mafia fugitive was living on a Caribbean island. Then police saw his YouTube cooking videos  CNN
  5. Italian mafia fugitive is caught after his YouTube cooking show tips off police  Yahoo! Voices
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 一名涉嫌意大利黑手党的逃犯已经逃亡了六年多--直到警方在YouTube烹饪节目中认出他的纹身。
一名涉嫌意大利黑手黨的逃犯已經逃亡了六年多--直到警方在YouTube烹飪節目中認出他的紋身。
